t: Freedom by Evans, Darrell (1999) Audio CD - Amazon.com Music
s: I listened to this CD as a teen, and few weeks ago I decided that I wanted to have it on my Ipod. The words still speak to me and encourage me. Feels pretty current as well ... Powerful songs, great writing and Lincoln Brewster plays on it. What more can I say? As a worship team member (guitarist) this is an awesome array of music. Darrell ...

s: I was glad to find this CD at Amazon! Some years ago, when this album was new, God used this music in a profound way to help me in my own spiritual development! I had it on Cassette (back in the days of cassettes...). From the beginning to the end of the album, every song is powerful in leading the individual into a place of personal, practical worship.
